import CreateFundingSource from "../../../../assets/api-resource-tables/accounts/CreateFundingSource";

# Create a funding source for an account

This section details how to add a bank account to the main Dwolla Account.

To add a bank account as a Funding Source, you provide the account number and a routing number along with the Treasury Account in relation to which you want to attach the bank. Typically, a bank account that you add to the main Dwolla Account will have a status of “unverified”. In order to transfer money from your bank, you will need to [verify ownership of the account](/docs/balance/micro-deposit-verification).

## HTTP request

> `POST https://api.dwolla.com/funding-sources`

## Request parameters

<Table table={CreateFundingSource} />

## HTTP status and error codes

| HTTP Status | Code            | Message                                       |
| ----------- | --------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| 400         | ValidationError | Duplicate funding source or validation error. |
| 403         | Forbidden       | Not authorized to create funding source.      |

## Request and response

```bash
POST https://api-sandbox.dwolla.com/funding-sources

Accept: application/vnd.dwolla.v1.hal+json
```

```php
/**
 * No example for this language yet.
 **/
```

```ruby
# Using dwolla_v2 - https://github.com/Dwolla/dwolla-v2-ruby
request_body = {
  _links: {
    "treasury-account" => {
      href: "https://api-sandbox.dwolla.com/treasury-accounts/ea5f9468-4374-410f-b52e-5461d8cbca98"
    }
  },
  name: "My Checking Bank",
  bankAccountType: "checking",
  accountNumber: "123456789",
  routingNumber: "222222226"
}

funding_source = app_token.post "funding-sources", request_body
funding_source.response_headers[:location] # => "https://api-sandbox.dwolla.com/funding-sources/04173e17-6398-4d36-a167-9d98c4b1f1c3"
```

```python
# Using dwollav2 - https://github.com/Dwolla/dwolla-v2-python
request_body = {
  '_links': {
    'treasury-account': {
      'href': 'https://api-sandbox.dwolla.com/treasury-accounts/ea5f9468-4374-410f-b52e-5461d8cbca98'
    }
  },
  'name': 'My Checking Bank',
  'bankAccountType': 'checking',
  'accountNumber': '123456789',
  'routingNumber': '222222226'
}

funding_source = app_token.post('funding-sources', request_body)
funding_source.headers['location'] # => 'https://api-sandbox.dwolla.com/funding-sources/04173e17-6398-4d36-a167-9d98c4b1f1c3'
```

```javascript
// Using dwolla-v2 - https://github.com/Dwolla/dwolla-v2-node
var requestBody = {
  _links: {
    "treasury-account": {
      href: "https://api-sandbox.dwolla.com/treasury-accounts/ea5f9468-4374-410f-b52e-5461d8cbca98",
    },
  },
  name: "My Savings Bank",
  bankAccountType: "savings",
  accountNumber: "123456789",
  routingNumber: "222222226",
};

dwolla
  .post("funding-sources", requestBody)
  .then((res) => res.headers.get("location")); // => 'https://api-sandbox.dwolla.com/funding-sources/04173e17-6398-4d36-a167-9d98c4b1f1c3'
```
